<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(CI-&gt;getOperandBundle(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext/#a44d727ac5fccf852bfb2bae3e06adc9cadb925bc2eb2c117b3ec0b76d1e267127">LLVMContext::OB&#95;kcfi</a>)-&gt;Inputs&#91;0&#93;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">            -&gt;getZExtValue();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Drop the KCFI operand bundle.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit a check and trap if the target hash doesn&#39;t match.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> Builder(<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;FuncPtr = <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>-&gt;getCalledOperand();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ARM uses the least significant bit of the function pointer to select</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between ARM and Thumb modes for the callee. Instructions are always</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at least 16-bit aligned, so clear the LSB before we compute the hash</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// location.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>.isARM() || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>.isThumb()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
